hops.message: DELETE endpoint remove_participant implemented with proper authentication, authorization, and database operations
ConversationParticipant model referenced and properly used for participant management
leave_conversation method properly implemented to remove user from active conversation participants
Participant removal notifications properly broadcast to remaining conversation members
WebSocket router properly included in main FastAPI application

defects.msg: Frontend WebSocket context does not implement participant removal functionality - missing removeParticipant method
Message interface UI does not provide participant management controls (add/remove participants)
WebSocket tests do not specifically test participant removal functionality
